perkid_ability_hatchet_feralrush.name: Crippling Feral Rush

Arcane

perkid_amulet_dodgesuccess_cleansedot.name: Shirking DoT Cleanse
perkid_amulet_dodgesuccess_cleansedot.description: Dodging through an enemy attack while in a light equip load causes you to lose 1 DoT (Bleed, Burn, Poison) debuff. (Can only trigger once every ${ Math.round(5)} seconds.)
label: DebuffDur

perkid_amulet_dodgesuccess_cleansedebili.name: Shirking Debilitate Cleanse
perkid_amulet_dodgesuccess_cleansedebili.description: Dodging through an enemy attack while in a medium equip load causes you to lose 1 Debilitate (Rend, Weaken, Exhaust, Disease) debuff. (Can only trigger once every ${ Math.round(5)} seconds.)
label: DebuffDur

perkid_armor_dodgesuccess_fortify.name: Shirking Fortification
perkid_armor_dodgesuccess_fortify.description: Dodging through an enemy attack grants fortify, increasing damage absorption by ${ Math.round(2 * perkMultiplier)}% for ${ Math.round(6)}s. Each armor piece with this perk increases the potency of the effect.
label: DmgAbsorb

perkid_head_oncrittaken_critchance.name: Critical Retribution
perkid_head_oncrittaken_critchance.description: On Crit taken, gain ${ Math.round(3 * perkMultiplier)}% increased crit chance for ${ Math.round(7)}s (${ Math.round(20)}s Cooldown)
label: Proc

perkid_chest_onblockedhittaken_staminare.name: Sturdy Energy
perkid_chest_onblockedhittaken_staminare.description: When blocking a hit while below ${ Math.round(30)}% stamina, gain ${ Math.round(20 * perkMultiplier)}% increased stamina regen for ${ Math.round(6)}s. (Effect is removed if player becomes exhausted)
label: Proc

perkid_hands_onblockedhit_empowerstack.name: Empowering Breaker
perkid_hands_onblockedhit_empowerstack.description: When your attacks are blocked, gain a stack of empower, increasing damage by ${ Math.round(2 * perkMultiplier)}% for ${ Math.round(5)}s (${ Math.round(5)} stacks Max)
label: Proc

perkid_legs_dodgesuccess_stamina.name: Shirking Energy
perkid_legs_dodgesuccess_stamina.description: If a hit is avoided by dodging while in a light equip load, gain ${ Math.round(10 * perkMultiplier)} stamina (${ Math.round(6)}s cooldown)
label: Proc

perkid_tools_gatherproc_regen.name: Gathering Recovery
perkid_tools_gatherproc_regen.description: While not in combat, After gathering from a node, heal for ${ Math.round(50 * perkMultiplier)} HP per second for ${ Math.round(5)}. (Removed if any damage is taken)
label: GatherProc

perkid_weapon_attunement_fire.name: Flame Attunement
perkid_weapon_attunement_fire.description: Attacks deal an additional ${ Math.round(18)}% weapon damage as Fire. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects. (cooldown ${ Math.round(1)}s)
label: Elemental

perkid_weapon_attunement_ice.name: Frost Attunement
perkid_weapon_attunement_ice.description: Attacks deal an additional ${ Math.round(18)}% weapon damage as Ice. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects. (cooldown ${ Math.round(1)}s)
label: Elemental

perkid_weapon_attunement_nature.name: Arboreal Attunement
perkid_weapon_attunement_nature.description: Attacks deal an additional ${ Math.round(18)}% weapon damage as Nature. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects. (cooldown ${ Math.round(1)}s)
label: Elemental

perkid_weapon_attunement_void.name: Abyssal Attunement
perkid_weapon_attunement_void.description: Attacks deal an additional ${ Math.round(18)}% weapon damage as Void. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects. (cooldown ${ Math.round(1)}s)
label: Elemental

perkid_armor_conditioning_fire.name: Flame Conditioning
perkid_armor_conditioning_fire.description: After being hit with Fire DMG, gain ${ Math.round(4)}% Fire absorption ${ Math.round(5)}s. Each armor piece with this perk increases the potency of the effect.
label: Elemental

perkid_armor_conditioning_ice.name: Frost Conditioning
perkid_armor_conditioning_ice.description: After being hit with Ice DMG, gain ${ Math.round(4)}% Ice absorption for ${ Math.round(5)}s. Each armor piece with this perk increases the potency of the effect.
label: Elemental

perkid_armor_conditioning_nature.name: Arboreal Conditioning
perkid_armor_conditioning_nature.description: After being hit with Nature DMG, gain ${ Math.round(4)}% Nature absorption for ${ Math.round(5)}s. Each armor piece with this perk increases the potency of the effect.
label: Elemental

perkid_armor_conditioning_void.name: Abyssal Conditioning
perkid_armor_conditioning_void.description: After being hit with Void DMG, gain ${ Math.round(4)}% Void absorption for ${ Math.round(5)}s. Each armor piece with this perk increases the potency of the effect.
label: Elemental

perkid_pvp_weapon_armorpenetration_onbac.name: Penetrating Backstab
perkid_pvp_weapon_armorpenetration_onbac.description: PvP Only: Backstabs penetrate ${ Math.round(27)}% of a player's armor.
label: DmgCon

perkid_pvp_weapon_armorpenetration_onhea.name: Penetrating Headshot
perkid_pvp_weapon_armorpenetration_onhea.description: PvP Only: Headshots penetrate ${ Math.round(22)}% of a player's armor.
label: DmgCon

perkid_pvp_weapon_blockbreak_rend.name: Fractured Rend
perkid_pvp_weapon_blockbreak_rend.description: PvP Only: When block breaking a player, inflict rend, reducing damage absorption by ${ Math.round(12)}% for ${ Math.round(4)}s.
label: Blocking

perkid_pvp_weapon_cleansebuff_crits.name: Purifying Crits
perkid_pvp_weapon_cleansebuff_crits.description: PvP Only: Critical hits against players remove ${ Math.round(1)} buff from the target. (Cooldown ${ Math.round(10)}s)
label: Proc

perkid_pvp_weapon_exhaustedtarget_slow.name: Exhausted Exploitation
perkid_pvp_weapon_exhaustedtarget_slow.description: PvP Only: Hits against Exhausted players inflict Slow, reducing movement speed by ${ Math.round(15)}% for ${ Math.round(4)} seconds.
label: Proc

perkid_pvp_weaponmagic_dmgtohaste.name: Alacritous Punishment
perkid_pvp_weaponmagic_dmgtohaste.description: PvP Only: Deal ${ Math.round(8)}% additional damage to players with Haste.
label: DmgCon

perkid_pvp_shield_fortifystackonblock.name: Sturdy Fortification
perkid_pvp_shield_fortifystackonblock.description: PvP Only: Blocking player attacks adds a stack of ${ Math.round(4)}% fortify for ${ Math.round(5)}s on self for each blocked hit (Max ${ Math.round(5)} stacks)
label: Proc

perkid_pvp_armor_dodgesuccess_heal.name: Shirking Heals
perkid_pvp_armor_dodgesuccess_heal.description: PvP Only: Successfully dodging an attack heals ${ Math.round(100)} health + ${ Math.round(1)}% of your max HP. (Each armor piece with this perk adds a stack. Can only trigger once every 5s)
label: ArmorHealth

perkid_pvp_armor_siegedamagereduction.name: Siege Ward
perkid_pvp_armor_siegedamagereduction.description: PvP Only: Receive ${ Math.round(6)}% less damage from Siege weapons.
label: DmgAbsorb

perkid_pvp_ring_onkill_empowerstack.name: Mortal Empowerment
perkid_pvp_ring_onkill_empowerstack.description: PvP Only: Player kills grant a persistent ${ Math.round(2)}% damage bonus that lasts until downed, death, or game mode transitions. Duration refreshes on re-application. (Stacks up to ${ Math.round(15)} times. This effect can not be cleansed)
label: DmgCon

perkid_pvp_ring_dmgpertargetbuff.name: Invigorated Punishment
perkid_pvp_ring_dmgpertargetbuff.description: PvP Only: Abilities deal ${ Math.round(2)}% bonus damage per buff on a player. (Max ${ Math.round(8)} buffs)
label: DmgCon

perkid_pvp_amulet_dodgesuccess_dmg.name: Shirking Empower
perkid_pvp_amulet_dodgesuccess_dmg.description: PvP Only: After successfully dodging an attack obtain Empower, increasing damage dealt by ${ Math.round(4)}% for ${ Math.round(10)}s. Duration refreshes when new stack is applied. (stacks ${ Math.round(4)} times)
label: Proc
